question: What kind of municipalities are provided for in Part IX-A to the Constitution of India?
explanation:
Under the 74th Amendment Act of 1992 and Part IX-A to the Constitution of India, following three types of municipalities are to be constituted in every state-
a. A nagar panchayat for a transitional areaÂ 
b. A municipal council for a smaller urban area
c. A municipal corporation for a larger urban area
